abstract: Google will make applications like Gmail and Docs and Spreadsheets available offline, in a move that will challenge Microsoft.
snippet: Google will make applications like Gmail and Docs and Spreadsheets available offline, in a move that will challenge Microsoft.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO, May 30 — Millions of people enjoy free Web-based software programs that deliver e-mail, news and many other services. But those programs are available to users only when they are online.

abstract: Bill Gates and Steven P. Jobs appeared in public to relive old battles and speculate about the future of digital culture and technology.
snippet: Bill Gates and Steven P. Jobs appeared in public to relive old battles and speculate about the future of digital culture and technology.
lead_paragraph: CARLSBAD, Calif., May 30 — In a highly anticipated encounter, Bill Gates of Microsoft and Steven P. Jobs of Apple took the stage Wednesday evening to relive old battles and alliances and speculate about the future of digital culture and technology.

headline.main: For Jobs and Gates, a Night to Reminisce
headline.print_headline: A Trip Down Memory Lane and Over the Horizon

abstract: Microsoft's version of the multi-touch computer adds one very cool, though impractical, twist: interaction with other electronics.
snippet: Microsoft's version of the multi-touch computer adds one very cool, though impractical, twist: interaction with other electronics.
lead_paragraph: It was just about the strangest call I'd ever received from Microsoft. "We have a new product we want to show you," said the PR woman (I'm paraphrasing). "But we can't tell you what it is, or even what category. But it's truly revolutionary. It's going to change the way people work with their computers."

headline.main: Much Ado About Microsoft's Surface Computer
headline.kicker: From the Desk of David Pogue
